Interface IMainModel2MainViewAdapter

      • createChatRoomMVC

        IMainModel2CRMVCAdapter createChatRoomMVC(IUser userStub,
                                          IChatRoom chatRoom,
                                          MixedDataDictionary dictionary)
        Create a chat room miniMVC.
        Parameters:
        userStub - - the current user stub used to create the chat room mini MVC.
        chatRoom - - the chat room object used to create the chat room mini MVC.
        dictionary - - the mixed data type dictionary.
        chatRoomName - - the name of the chat room.
        Returns:
        The main model to chat room mini MVC adapter.

        Parameters:
        currentUser - the current user stub used to remove the chat room mini MVC.
        chatRoom - the chat room object used to remove the chat room mini MVC.
        chatRoomName - the name of the chat room.
